description.raw:
sdformat8 currently fails to compile on brew if urdfdom is installed. To confirm this, I've created a homebrew pull request that promotes urdfdom from an optional dependency to a required dependency:

* https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/988

Building sdformat8 against that homebrew PR causes a build failure:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=sdformat-ci-sdformat8-homebrew-amd64&build=65)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-sdformat8-homebrew-amd64/65/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-sdformat8-homebrew-amd64/65/

~~~
src/parser_urdf.cc:30:10: fatal error: 'urdf_model/model.h' file not found
#include <urdf_model/model.h>
         ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1 error generated.
~~~

The problem is that the cmake target includes only the urdfdom include dir, and not the urdfdom_headers include dir. urdfdom is detected with pkg-config, and the `_CFLAGS` and `_LDFLAGS` variables have all the info about required dependencies, so these flags are added to the sdformat library target with `target_compile_options` and `target_link_options`.

Confirming the fix:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=1146)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1146/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1146/

sdformat8 currently fails to compile on brew if urdfdom is installed. To confirm this, I've created a homebrew pull request that promotes urdfdom from an optional dependency to a required dependency:

  • https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/988

Building sdformat8 against that homebrew PR causes a build failure:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-sdformat8-homebrew-amd64/65/
src/parser_urdf.cc:30:10: fatal error: 'urdf_model/model.h' file not found
#include <urdf_model/model.h>
         ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1 error generated.

The problem is that the cmake target includes only the urdfdom include dir, and not the urdfdom_headers include dir. urdfdom is detected with pkg-config, and the _CFLAGS and _LDFLAGS variables have all the info about required dependencies, so these flags are added to the sdformat library target with target_compile_options and target_link_options.

Confirming the fix:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1146/

title.raw: Fix homebrew build with external urdfdom
